hero.headline: I turn your ideas into
hero.typewriterWords: websites, real products, experiences, digital solutions, useful tools, extraordinary designs
hero.description: I create modern, high-performance web applications where clean code meets thoughtful design. From frontend to backend, I transform ideas into engaging digital experiences.

about.title: I am Antonio Murabito
about.bio: Web developer and graphic designer. I combine code and creativity to create engaging digital experiences and effective visuals.
about.description: I feel at ease where code meets creativity, transforming ideas into visuals and interactive interfaces that speak louder than words. From clean designs to bold brands, I make your digital presence memorable, meaningful, and unmistakable.

stats.title: Developer Statistics
stats.description: Overview of my activities and portfolio projects.

experience1.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience1.subtitle: Freelancer at BDGROUPSRL 2025 - PRESENT
experience1.description: Currently working as a freelance web developer for BDGROUPSRL, focusing on API server optimization and authentication system development. I improve server performance, implement security protocols, and optimize database queries to enhance overall system efficiency. I use modern technologies to deliver scalable and secure web solutions for enterprise applications.
experience1.skills: Next.js, ExpressJS, TypeScript, MySQL, JWT, TailwindCSS, Python

experience2.title: Graphic Designer & SMM
experience2.subtitle: Freelancer at Socialnet 2025 - PRESENT
experience2.description: In 2025, I co-founded Socialnet, a Social Media Management & Marketing agency. We offer social media management, engaging visual content creation, and communication strategies for businesses and professionals. Our goal is to improve clients' digital image, increasing visibility and online engagement.

experience3.title: Web Developer
experience3.subtitle: Freelancer at BDGROUPSRL 2021 - PRESENT
experience3.description: Since 2021, I have worked as a freelance web developer, specializing in designing and building modern, dynamic, and customized websites for businesses and individuals. My goal is to provide functional, intuitive, and SEO-optimized solutions that maximize online visibility. I use modern technologies to create responsive platforms optimized for user experience, handling databases and performance. I also collaborate with organizations like Senes Cooperativa Sociale.
experience3.skills: Fastify, Supabase, PrismaORM, BetterAuth, Next.js, TailwindCSS, React
